subject: Basketball (College)
lead_paragraph: Tom Maayan, a sophomore point guard at Seton Hall, learned on Monday that his exemption from the Israeli military is for only 120 days and that he is expected back by Jan. 2.
snippet: Tom Maayan, a sophomore point guard at Seton Hall, learned on Monday that his exemption from the Israeli military is for only 120 days and that he is expected back by Jan. 2.
